hero.subtitle: Trueque reimagines the ancient art of bartering for the modern world. Your unused items find new life, and your unique skills foster lasting connections!

howItWorks.title: How Trueque Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Quickly create your profile. Add a touch of personality to let the community know who you are.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Easily list items you no longer need or skills you're happy to share. Good photos and descriptions help!
howItWorks.step3Desc: Browse or search for items and services offered by others in your local community. Send a friendly message to connect.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Chat with members to agree on the terms of your exchange. Barter items, skills, or a mix!
howItWorks.step5Desc: After the exchange, share your experience. Honest ratings build a trustworthy and vibrant community.

whyTrueque.title: Why Trueque?
whyTrueque.lead: Trueque brings community back to exchange. Trade items and skills‚Äîlike a vintage lamp for guitar lessons or coding help for garden tips.
whyTrueque.secondary: It's about valuing time, talents, and treasures, not just money. We foster a supportive network where every exchange strengthens bonds and enriches lives.

wasteFree.title: Waste-Free Network
wasteFree.description: Give items a second life. Reduce waste, share more sustainably!
wasteFree.backDescription: Each trade helps our planet. Join the green exchange movement and make a difference!

modernBartering.title: Modern Bartering
modernBartering.description: Items, skills, or even a bit of cash. Flexible and fair deals for everyone.
modernBartering.backDescription: Negotiate with ease. Your terms, your treasures. Combine offers for the perfect swap.

smartDiscovery.title: Smart Discovery
smartDiscovery.description: Swipe for treasures! Find exactly what you need from local folks nearby.
smartDiscovery.backDescription: Our smart filters and swipe interface make finding your next trade fun and easy.

skillExchange.title: Skill Exchange Hub
skillExchange.description: Share talents, learn new things. Connect with others and grow together!
skillExchange.backDescription: Teach, learn, collaborate. Unlock your potential by exchanging valuable skills.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Promoting reuse and reducing waste for a healthier planet.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building strong local connections through shared experiences.

trust.title: Trust & Safety
trust.description: Fostering a secure and respectful environment for all members.

value.title: Value Beyond Money
value.description: Recognizing the inherent worth of skills, items, and time.

testimonial1.quote: I traded my old camera for amazing pottery classes! Trueque helped me find a new hobby and a friend.
testimonial1.name: David M.

testimonial2.quote: Needed help with my garden, and found someone willing to trade their green thumb for my coding skills. Win-win!
testimonial2.name: Sarah K.

testimonial3.quote: It's so much more rewarding than just buying new. I love giving my items a second life and connecting with people.
testimonial3.name: Hector P.

impact.title:
Beyond Transactions,
We Build Vibrant Connections!
impact.lead: Trueque isn't just about stuff; it's about the people and the stories behind every exchange.
impact.listItem2: Learn new skills from passionate locals.
impact.listItem3: Reduce your footprint, one trade at a time.
impact.listItem4: Join a lively network that values sharing.

cta.title: Ready to Revitalize Exchange?
cta.subtitle: Unlock value, discover community, and thrive on connection over cash with Trueque.

how-it-works.pageTitle: How Trueque Works: Your Journey to Smarter Exchange

intro.title: Unlock a World of Exchange, Step by Step
intro.subtitle: Discover how Trueque makes bartering simple, fun, and effective. From finding your perfect match to sealing the deal, we've designed a seamless experience for our community.

step1.title: Find Your Perfect Exchange Partner
step1.description: Begin your Trueque adventure by creating your profile and listing items or skills you want to exchange. Our intuitive, Tinder-like matching system helps you discover exactly what you're looking for. Swipe through offerings, and if another user likes something of yours that you've also shown interest in from them ‚Äì it's a Match! This kicks off the exciting bartering process.
step1.feature1_desc: Our algorithm suggests relevant items and skills based on your preferences and listings.
step1.feature2_desc: Looking for something specific? Use advanced filters like category, color, material, location, and even weight to narrow down your search.

step2.title: Chat with Your Matches Intelligently
step2.description: Once you've matched, our integrated chat springs to life! It's not just any chat ‚Äì it intelligently displays the items or skills that you and your match have mutually liked. This real-time visibility makes it easy to see what sparked the connection and jumpstart your negotiation.
step2.feature1_desc: See liked items directly in your chat window for focused conversations.
step2.feature2_desc: As preferences change or new items are liked, the chat context updates instantly.

step3.title: Craft the Perfect Offer
step3.description: Our dynamic negotiation feature puts you in control. Clearly propose what you want from your match and what you're offering in return from your available items or skills. Need to balance the deal? You can even suggest or request an additional monetary value to make the exchange perfectly fair for both parties. View past offers to learn and strategize!
step3.feature1_desc: Combine items, skills, and optional cash to create tailored proposals.
step3.feature2_desc: Keep track of offer iterations and view past offers for reference.

step4.title: Know Your Trading Partner
step4.description: Transparency is key in Trueque. Before committing to an exchange, dive into your match's profile. You can see a detailed list of all items and skills they offer, their complete trade history (number of successful trades), and authentic reviews from other users they've exchanged with. After your trade, contribute to the community by leaving your own honest review!
step4.feature1_desc: View comprehensive item/skill listings for any user.
step4.feature2_desc: Read feedback from past trades to build confidence.
step4.feature3_desc: See how experienced a trader is at a glance.

step5.title: Showcase Your Wares & Skills
step5.description: Easily upload and manage your items and skills. Provide detailed descriptions, add clear photos, and categorize everything to make it easy for others to find. A well-managed inventory is your key to attracting great matches and successful exchanges.
step5.feature1_desc: Quickly add items and skills with our user-friendly interface.
step5.feature2_desc: Keep your offerings up-to-date and well-described.

outro.title: Ready to Start Your Trueque Journey?
outro.subtitle: Join our growing community and rediscover the joy of meaningful exchange. It's more than just bartering; it's about connection, sustainability, and unlocking hidden value.

Trade what you have, find what you need,: Trade what you have, find what you need, connect with your community.

waitlist.headline: Trade What You Don't Need for What You Do ‚Äì No Money Needed!
waitlist.description: Trueque helps you get that house fix, special toy, new car, or help with your garden without spending any money. Simply offer something you no longer need and start trading. Join the waitlist now to be among the first to try it out!

waitlist.incentive2: Special updates just for waitlist members

faqs.question: What is Trueque?
faqs.answer: Trueque is a revolutionary app that lets you trade what you don't need for what you do, without using money. You offer an item, and someone else offers something in exchange. It's that simple.

faqs.question: How does the trade process work?
faqs.answer: Just offer an item you no longer need and browse available trades. You'll get notifications when someone is interested in your offer. Once you match, you trade directly through the app!

faqs.question: When will the app be available?
faqs.answer: We're launching on June 12! Be the first to try it out by joining the waitlist now.

waitlist.finalCta: Get Early Access ‚Äì Join the Waitlist Today!
waitlist.benefitReminder: No payment, just trade. Start swapping today!
